Narrative: Officers responded to the Mini Mart for an alarm and observed the glass door broken with noone inside. Security camera footage showed a black male wearing a blue hoodie with a whiteand red logo in the back, black jeans, black shoes, and a black mask throw a rock through theglass door. The video footage then showed when the suspect broke inside the store, ran behindthe cashier counter, stole merchandise, and exited the store in under a minute.
2019 Hyundai Elantra stolen, later located in Hyattsville with the front passenger window brokenand the ignition damaged.
Juvenile's phone taken by another known juvenile, GPD principal advised.
Adult man reported missing, no critical factors.
Victim's two cars vandalized, front license plate stolen.
Truck bed shell pried open and tools stolen.
Stolen Hyundai Sonata located after calls reporting teenagers skipping class.
Weather seals of  2023 Hyundai Kona bent outwards with cracks in the plastic.
Unlocked car rummaged through, nothing taken.
Residence front door and garage found locked but damaged, key lockbox missing, owneradvised to change the locks.
Video camera footage showed two men force open residence balcony door, enter theapartment, and steal personal property.
2019 Kia Forte had the rear passenger side window broken and the steering column damaged.
2020 Kia Forte  had the passenger side back window broken and the ignition damaged,personal property was also taken from the car.
Three cars were broken into and had handicap placards stolen, two additional cars were brokeninto, unknown if anything was taken.

Location: Kenilworth Ave Nb / Greenbelt Rd Eb

Narrative: Former tenant caused a disturbance at residence, arrested on an open warrant.
Traffic stop resulted in driver being arrested on an open warrant.
Patio glass door broken by thrown rocks.
Victim wrote check to contractor for house remodel, victim no longer able to contact thecontractor.
Road rage incident ended with driver kicking the other car's window off.
Hyundai found with the right rear window broken and the ignition damaged, towed forsafekeeping.
Stolen 2017 Honda Civic Hatchback was found with major damage.

On May 7, 2023 at 2:32 pm, Greenbelt Police officers spotted a 16-year-old boy with multipleopen warrants by the Shell Food Mart and arrested him. While searching him, officers found astolen black handgun with an extended magazine. His open warrants were for first degreeassault, armed carjacking and armed robbery.
